name: Ronikara
description:
Ronikara

Have you ever wanted to be a ninja-cyborg fighting other cyborgs? If yes then listen: this is your CHANCE!

Ronikara is a game where you play as a cyborg which is sent to kill all the cyborgs that lost control.

It is a lan multiplayer first-person game. Here you can use all your technics, elemetrary technics and most importantly - your katana, to ELIMINATE all your enemies!

-- Game mechanics --

You can cast as many technics as you wish but you must watch your mana level. However when don't have enought mana to cast a technic you switch your katana to desired element and use it against your enemies. 

Different elements can have combos. For example katana damage will be doubled when enemy has wet status on ther body and your katana has electro element. However some elements dispells others. For example fire katana dispells water state on enemy and vice versa. 

-- Controls --

WASD to move.

Shift to dash.

Q to switch between technic cast and katana modes.

left, right, middle mouse buttons to cast technics

ESC to open pause menu

-- ATTENTION -- 

You can find list of available tehnics and ways to  cast  them  in the pause menu.
